meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one millionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a micra to measure the tiny organism.
meanings.sent2: I need a micra to accurately measure this small object.
meanings.sent3: The micra decided to go on strike because it felt too small for the job.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so precise, it was like she had a micra for eyes.
meanings.sent5: The micra of dust floating in the sunlight was mesmerizing.
